name: Tripping Twirl
prerequisiteFormula: @int_score >= 13 AND @feat:combat_expertise AND @feat:improved_trip AND @feat:tripping_staff AND @feat:weapon_focus#@quarterstaff AND @feat:weapon_specialization#@quarterstaff AND @bab >= 12
descriptionText: You can make a trip attack with a quarterstaff on all adjacent enemies.
benefitText: As a full-round action, while wielding a quarterstaff two-handed, you can attempt a trip combat maneuver against each enemy adjacent to you.
specialText: If you are a magus with the staff magus archetype, you can use spellstrike on any one trip combat maneuver you make with the staff.
